N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 572.7 - Motor vehicle operation

State Regulations
(a) All
persons are required to obey posted speed limits, traffic control devices and
posted parking requirements at all times. (b) Full stop at all stop signs is
required. (c) Pedestrians have the
right of way. (d) Motor vehicles
may not be operated on any sidewalk or grassed area. Service vehicles and
authorized contractor vehicles are not included in this prohibition. (e) University police officers, City of

Buffalo police and Town of Amherst police are empowered to enforce all
ordinances and laws pertaining to traffic regulation. Notes
